title: vidhiyenru
sahitya:
vidhiyenru nI vIsanappaDAdE vIru koNDu kaDaittEru manamE


anupallavi

  matiyUnrip-parama pati pAdam Unrin mannuL ADum jyOti nanru kANumE


caraNam    ETTu vAzhaikkAi ilaikkAghumO eTTi pazhuttAl kaTTi mAmpazhamO
pATTukkETrapadi pakkavAdyam pOl paNNum paNiyum eNNum puNNiyamAm
